verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence] [ARGM-ADV: both] [V: addressed] [ARG1: the National Rifle Association Annual Meetings and Exhibits] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-ADV: making history] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence] both addressed the National Rifle Association Annual Meetings and Exhibits on Friday , [V: making] [ARG1: history] .
